host.name: Sonder NYC Team
host.about: Rooms, suites, and apartments in over 40 cities around the world. Every Sonder features designer details, keyless entry, and fast free WiFi. Experience a better way to stay today.

listing.title: Sonder Battery Park | King Studio w/ City View
listing.subtitle: Entire rental unit in New York, United States

highlights.title: Self check-in
highlights.subtitle: Check yourself in with the keypad.

highlights.title: Extra spacious
highlights.subtitle: Guests love this home‚Äôs spaciousness for a comfortable stay.

highlights.title: Great location
highlights.subtitle: Guests who stayed here in the past year loved the location.

listing.description:
Fill your New York City stay with style at Battery Park. Your space includes in-suite laundry, a modern kitchen, and is on floors 10‚Äì16. Savor the view of this magical city from the seasonal rooftop pool. There's a fitness center, golf simulator, and co-working space. Why not have it all with endless amenities and an incredible location? You'll be across from The Battery ‚Äî a beautiful waterfront oasis. The New York Stock Exchange, Wall Street, and One World Trade Center are a short walk away.

The space
We‚Äôre here to help navigate your stay from start to finish. Check in. Request amenities. Connect to WiFi. Contact customer support. Whatever you need, we‚Äôve got you covered.

This Sonder has a front desk which is staffed 24/7. Our on-site team is available to ensure you have a better stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Housekeeping services available on-demand for a nominal fee
- In-suite laundry
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Chromecast for streaming
- Seasonal rooftop pool
- Fitness center
- Co-working space
- Music studio
- Golf simulator room
- Luggage lockers (first available)
- Limited paid street parking available

What‚Äôs nearby
- 5 minute walk to Antica Ristorante (tableside preparations of classic Italian dishes)
- 8 minute walk to The Dead Rabbit (Redbreast 12, neat, at this iconic Irish bar)
- 10 minute subway to Takahachi Bakery (try the matcha crepe, thank us later)
- 10 minute walk to One World Trade Center (stunning 360-degree views from the observation deck)

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay ‚Äî while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

Guests can book housekeeping services on-demand for a nominal fee. This ensures you can enjoy an uninterrupted and environmentally sustainable stay. Housekeeping services must be scheduled 24 hours in advance.

Other things to note
- There's no cable
- The pool is open from Memorial Day to Labor Day, yearly
- You may hear construction noise from renovations nearby
- This building briefly tests the fire alarms on the last Friday of each month. We apologize for any inconvenience

Registration number
Exempt

details.title: Neighborhood highlights
details.content: High-rises, cobbled streets, and the New York Stock Exchange. At the southern tip of Manhattan Island, the Financial District is one of the city‚Äôs most historic areas. And this neighborhood is more than just a financial hub. Find iconic monuments and stunning mid-century architecture on every block. Catch the ferry from Wall Street for East River views of the Statue of Liberty and the Brooklyn Bridge. Or to get a taste of local delights, there are sidewalk cafes for cozy coffees and Stone Street dive bars for happy-hour drinks. Whether you‚Äôre the Charging Bull or the Fearless Girl ‚Äî FiDi is for you.

rules.title: Additional rules
rules.html:
1. Guests will be charged in full for any damages or violations of the house rules below.

2. Guests must be 18+ years of age to make a reservation.

3. All guests must complete Sonder‚Äôs online check-in process to stay with us. This may require a photo of guests‚Äô government-issued ID and personal information to verify their identity and comply with regulatory requirements.

4. Check-in starts at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be requested but is not guaranteed. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

5. Guests are typically not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

6. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including in private balconies and shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a 250 USD fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, or repair damages.

7. Commercial business work without written consent, illegal activity, and possession of firearms are strictly prohibited.

8. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

9. Pets are not allowed unless otherwise noted. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

10. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

11. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the guest space to monitor excessive noise levels.

12. Guests take full responsibility for loss, injury, or damages that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

13. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses and may be removed from the property.

rules.subtitle: ‚ÄúWe may have security cameras on the exterior of the building and in shared spaces, such as hallways, parking lots, lobbies, amenity spaces, and elevators. Security cameras are not actively monitored.‚Äù

reviews.comments: Overall great experience very comfortable place
More of a hotel feel then a air bnb, very good location
Great stay !

The apartment was absolutely beautiful and clean! The amenities mentioned were all accurate. Check-in/check-out instructions were all easy and accurate.
The area is quiet and not too much traffic, there aren‚Äôt any supermarkets near so instacart or DoorDash would be your go to if you‚Äôre looking to get groceries & you‚Äôre not familiar with how to travel in the city.
There was someone at the front desk 24/7 and even though I didn‚Äôt ask for any assistance they were helpful and informative to other guest. I would definitely recommend & stay again!
Sonder is super responsive, unit clean and very nice. Would stay there again!
Lovely stay and attentive service.
The team at the front desk were so good, no matter the time of day or night they were always cheery and super helpful
For my first time coming to NYC, it was great for a first stay. Close to the subway and food and coffee shops. Receptionists were really nice and sweet. Helped if needed. would recommend!
Great place and host was very responsive
Excellent place
We had a pleasant stay. The street is noisy (but somehow also clear). The kitchen was very minimally equipped, but it was completely sufficient for 2 people.
Love the Sonder! Felt right at home! Safe and family friendly!
Nice place to stay
Really liked the place, loved the view from both window and Roof top. Nice clean restroom and kitchen. Unlike other places this one had lot of useful kitchen utensils.
Everything excellent and unbeatable. Thank you very much
The space was clean, spacious and well appointed. The online check-in went smoothly, and the location was great ‚Äì perfect for exploring the city. Clear recommendation!

The space was well set up and comfortable. Very neat clean. The people I dealt with did not know the actual unit well. However they found the relevant information and contacted me. Although we were not using much of the kitchen it was fully set up to
cook meals. It even has in unit laundry.
Classy and professional place to stay for business or leisure

The location was good, there were a couple subway stations nearby, a whole foods 5 min away, the space was big, but it wasn‚Äôt as clean‚Ä¶ The electric kettle still had water, the toaster had bread crumbs from previous guests, so I wonder how well they clean everything in there, since those basic things were not taken care of.
Staff were nice and friendly, they give you everything you need (trash bags, laundry detergent, dishwasher detergent, shampoo, body wash and conditioner, coffee filters, coffee and tea).
Overall a good experience, except for the cleanliness in the room. (Also kind of bad smell in the hallways)
Loved this location. The rooftop views & views from the room were great. The bed was so comfortable & the room was very spacious. Perfect for a night stay to enjoy the city more. I would come back!
Perfect!

Overall I enjoyed my stay at Sonder and would definitely stay again. My original room ended up smelling like smoke and so I asked for help and they found me another room. Unfortunately it was in a different location but it was only 10 mins away and they said they could reimburse for the Uber. They also upgraded me to a one bedroom apartment. The staff at Sonder went above and beyond and I‚Äôm thankful for their help. The apartment was perfect and I felt at home. Other than the smoke smell (which btw they don‚Äôt allow smoking in the rooms so someone broke the rules) I loved it.
Loved this place! Super convenient location, the host is super friendly, and check-in/check-out was a breeze! Felt like home away from home.
Great value for money in a fantastic location. Exactly as in the photos. Very lovely reception staff too with great local recommendations! With thanks from Australia üá¶üá∫üá¶üá∫üá¶üá∫

From the moment we walked into the unit we were at awe. It has in unit laundry, great sized kitchen, HUGE windows, (the pictures don‚Äôt do it any justice), and the heated floors in the bathroom were the cherry on top for myself, personally. The host was very accommodating. I‚Äôll be staying here anytime I‚Äôm in NYC.

Perfect place to stay in Downtown Manhattan. Located in the financial district, it‚Äôs easy to get around by subway and located on a very quiet street. Within walking distance to Wall St, One World Trade Center and Statue of Liberty Ferries. Apartment has all the amenities one could ask for, and beautiful views of the city.
Great place to stay, clean surroundings, both inside and outside, great security features and close to transport network. I would most definitely stay here again
Front desk personnel always so helpful and attentative
Great view and very clean. Located really close to subway and Battery Park. Very friendly and convenient. We will be staying at Sonder again

place was nice, just didnt look as the pictures in the Ad. All night there was a churping sound , first it was the fire alarm & then it sounded like it was coming from the smoke detector. other than that it was a cool spot
Very good location and apartment distribution. Yes, we would stay there again.
clean and accessible
A delightful stay! Thank you!
Perfect stay. Absolutely loved it
Amazing  place, loved service place..
Perfect, very good location

Everything was perfect, from the view to the apartment as such, very good cleaning and a beautiful and comfortable place. They just need a little more instruments from
Kitchen. But everything else was very good.
a really nice place to stay in! room is pretty, really clean, and it's a real simple to get in and out, and a close walk to the subway.
We had an excellent stay and would absolutely return to one of the Sonder residences for our future stays in NYC.

the studio was perfect. I would change the bed as it seems that it was very old but in all of the other aspects the room was perfect. You have some markets very closed to buy your own things and the subway is very closed as well.
I recommend

There was a leak in the storage closet that the hotel seemed pretty slow to address. I‚Äôm not sure if it ever got fixed or the leak dried up on its own since no one on the staff gave me a specific update after I flagged the issue to them.

My stay at Sonder in New York City was fantastic! The location couldn't be better right in the middle of everything restaurants, shops, and public transport were all super accessible. The place was modern and spotless It was an awesome experience and I‚Äôd definitely recommend Sonder to anyone visiting NYC. It‚Äôs perfect for both short and long stays!
Amazing experience
I had a wonderful time in the king studio. Very nice to have a music room and a rooftop to appreciate the sunset and the view on the hudson river. The team at the desk was really helpful.

So I had never heard of Sonder prior to this and wow - Exceeded all expectations- couldn‚Äôt believe I had never heard of it before! Will always look out for these in future, an excellent stay in every way. Room so spacious and absolutely perfect. Gym was great, location so convenient for travel - 10/10 stay.
The place was great! It was a lot more spacious than what I expected which is amazing. Very centrally located to all the good spots in New York and I would 100% stay here again! x

Our second time staying at a Sonder and we are always so pleased with our stays here.
We will be back.
I had a nice and quiet stay, I would come back. Unbelievable rest.
Great place to stay, 10/10 recommend. 5 minute walk to 2 subway stations. Easy check-in, kitchen well equipped and comfortable beds. Exactly what we were looking for.
The best!
Great Airbnb. Much bigger than expected!

Beautiful place to stay with nice view. My wife loved it. We couldn‚Äôt use the WiFi; we noticed it was broken and disconnected. I assumed the previous occupants damaged it because it was hiding beside the bed and nobody came to fix it. But above all we enjoyed our stay.
Thanks for everything

Aside from the lock issues for our room, the stay at Sonders was good. The front desk was always helpful. They promised us small concession for the lock trouble and they held up that promise. The kitchen had pots n pan but missing oil and salt , no big deal since the Whole Foods not that far from the property. The room was spacious and clutter free. Being that the property is near Battery park tunnel, the windows did their job for blocking the noise!

Thank you very much.
There was an emergency bell during my stay, but it was working properly and on the contrary, I was relieved.
Did you peel a pot in a different room?

Highly recommend
The space was light and spacious. On the 15th floor overlooking the East River. There were some subway lines right around the corner, which was very convenient. It was also very quiet and very little from the neighbors.
Recommended also the mattress, just right.

We will definitely stay here the next time we visit NYC. The hosts were amazing and accommodating when we had travels issues due to snow in Atlanta. They were helpful and understanding and easy to communicate with.

Very nice and responsive hotel staff. Good location and very well equipped room. However, the room was not ready at 4pm, the toilet was dirty, the very noisy heater stopped working several times, and no free cleaning offered for 1 week of stay? This is the first time I've been asked to pay $50.
Staff was great, views were amazing and such a perfect area to stay in
Brilliant offer

Mediocre stay. Don‚Äôt have too many complaints for what it is, in NYC. Nice apartment with a good view. Rooftop wasn‚Äôt accessible the first day when I had time. Excessive fees to add one additional night for my already 5 day stay. Okay pricing for location, views, and apartment. I did enjoy their music room. Fitness center was pretty small with only dumbbells up to 50lbs.
Great Location, great views and a great fully stocked apartment.
It was ideal for what I needed. Clean, tidy and had a functioning kitchen.
Excellent.
Love it! Great location!

I spent a week with my boyfriend and we had a great time, the area is quiet and well served, the apartment is spacious, comfortable and always warm.
Always very friendly and helpful staff.
Great views and a cool place to stay.

It was the best of the many places I stayed in New York. The only thing is that the tiles on the floor were broken, but it wasn't unusable. It just needed some repairs (room 1510). The heater worked well, the hot water came out well, and most of it was perfect.

Excellent stay. The probe team was attentive, responsive and very kind. Many thanks to them!
Beyond the ideal location for a New York stay, the property offers daily self-service the essentials for hot drinks and hygiene, which is a little extra.
The ocean view from the bedroom is very nice, the places are clean, comfortable and ingeniously arranged with ease without being devoid of elegance.
The rooftop makes it possible to enjoy a nice sunset without having to get away from your accommodation.
I highly recommend this place where I won't hesitate to stay again!

A spacious room with a fully equipped kitchen. Great view (we stayed on the 16th floor). Excellent central location. The only downside is that some minor details, like sockets and the built-in microwave, need a bit of maintenance.
I stayed at sonder during my FIRST visit to nyc. They were very helpful and friendly and helped me feel right at home. Beautiful views and rooftop areas. Very clean.
Was perfect u we enjoyed it a lot.
We loved staying in Sonder battery park! It was far enough from the craziness and we had an awesome time exploring the area.

The olace was nice clean with amazing view , the security and safety is high , there is nearby lots of restaurants and it‚Äôs just few blocks from Wall Street, there 4 min walkable metro station , it‚Äôs a good place to stay only few things the lighthouse little bit dim and I wish there is a carpet in the floor overall nice safe place to stay in New York
This place was so clean and amazing views close by, if you‚Äôre booking do it here!
The place was awesome! Actually much bigger than the description.  Perfectly located, we were able to get around, safe neighborhood, nice views! We enjoyed our stay.  Will definitely stay here again!

We had a great stay at Sonders, it‚Äôs on walking distance to the Ferry, Wall Street, world trade centre etc. Metro is nearby. The room was great, easy to handle with Sonders app. On the last day we could store our luggage and do some sight seeing before we went back. Front desk staff is easy to communicate with and very accommodating
Great location to either walk or grab an Uber to get somewhere in a reasonable amount of time.

Our 2nd time staying at this location- great location and great Host! Many great attractions nearby and walkable‚Ä¶if you‚Äôre looking for a fantastic breakfast you need to check out George‚Äôs that is only 2 minutes away!! Subway system right outside your door and have always felt very safe and comfortable staying at this location- highly recommend.
I had a great stay here. Everything was clean and orderly. The place was also really big (for New York). I would definitely stay here again.
It is in a great location to get to all the attractions either by walking or taking the subway!
No complaints. Clean, functional, as advertised. More like a corporate hotel than an AirBnB.
It was perfect.

A wonderful location so close to many subways. Very quiet, peaceful home away from home, after many days of great adventures in NYC, it was so lovely to get away from the hustle of uptown , quiet and really spacious apartment. Especially for
New York. Apt had incredible views . A true NYC experience.
Staff were wonderful nothing was ever a problem. From tourist tips, to general enquires of how things work in the apartment. So great to be able to cook especially with great supermarket just a few minutes walk away. Fantastic rooftop, get away too! Amenities were exactly as described. Look forward to staying with Sonder Battery Park again in the future. Highly recommend !

The accommodations are spacious and clean. The interior is nice but also nothing special for the price.
Check in is easy, and location is convenient.
The lounges and coworking space are rel. small and without window, and, hence, pretty dark. Initially, I planned to work in the coworking area but it was too small and dark.
The rooftop is beautiful. However, it was closed a few times, even during the official opening hours.

very lovely room, super nice staff, the kitchen was well equipped.
only little hiccup was when we paid $20 extra for early check in at 3.00pm and the room wasn't ready until 3.30pm.
Perfect place to stay for a NYC visit.
Very good area to stay in NY, comfortable, with lots of accesses. Super practical and comfortable apartment! Beautiful views!!!!
great place
Love it. Perfect place to stay in NYC. Better than I expected. Worth every dollar.

Sonder Battery Park Review
My stay at Sonder Battery Park was unfortunately far below expectations. While the location was convenient, nearly every aspect of the stay was disappointing.
First, the noise levels were unbearable, making it difficult to relax or sleep. Adding to the discomfort, the bed was extremely hard and lacked a proper slatted frame, which made for a very rudimentary sleeping arrangement.
Most of the electrical outlets didn‚Äôt work, and while this could be temporarily fixed with an extension cord strung across the room, it was not a suitable solution. The lamp didn‚Äôt work, the TV was broken for five days, and the shower curtain was in disrepair. The corner room I booked didn‚Äôt match the photos on the website, and the advertised pool was empty, despite being a key feature in their marketing.
The gym was so overcrowded that it was practically unusable, with around 10 people crammed into a 15-square-meter space at any given time. The lack of on-site servi

I had an amazing stay at this Airbnb! The location was incredibly convenient, with three subway lines just a short walk away. I was able to easily explore the city without any hassle. The room itself was extremely spacious and comfortable. It had everything I needed for a relaxing stay, from a comfortable bed to in unit washer/dryer. Overall, the combination of a great location and a wonderful room made for a perfect stay!"
Very Clean place and well put together! Will definitely be coming back!

Everything was as the listing described. The place was even bigger than we expected. The check in could not be any easier. It was clean and uncluttered with everything we needed, and in a convenient location.
Nice stay. The kitchen was well equipped. The staff were friendly. Would probably be better during summer where you can make the most of the facilities I.e. pool and rooftop.
Excellent stay .
Great place to stay.

We stayed with Sonder for five nights while in NYC. We were very pleased with the location and access to our room. Subway entrances were about a 5-7 minute walk. A convenience store was about 5 minutes away and restaurants were 5-10 minutes around the area. Our room was very clean and had a nice city view on the 15th floor. Bed was on the stiffer side, which is not my ideal comfort but my husband liked it. All the room amenities were easy to use and had the appropriate supplies. I will definitely use Sonder again. Thank you for a great stay!
Loved the decision for Sonder. Kitchen facilities and washer dryer very handy. Felt safe and homey - home away from home
A very nice place to stay with acces to a lot of subway stations that can get you anywhere
Place was great, although the floor was damaged when we got there but other than that Sonder is a really great place to stay.

Love this place !
The only problem is the mattress, too soft .
Great location for Liberty and Ellis Island.
I loved the stay
I recommend this hotel.
Nice space enjoyed my stay

The visit was work related and this was a great place to go home to at night. It was comfortable, had all the amenities needed, it felt safe and the neighbors were friendly. I would definitely recommend this place.
Great

A solid and serviceable place to stay in lower Manhattan. Has all the facilities you need for an independent stay. Suits a family staying for a week or so, and good for someone staying for longer on a work related assignment.
Great place and location. Would stay here again!
Really loved the stay with Sonder in Manhattan! Very nice!

Our stay was perfect.
We stayed on the 11th floor and we had an exceptional view of the Hudson and Jersey City, it was beautiful. The room is as expected from the description, although I wish there were more photos, the room was better than expected: very spacious, with an actual cabinet for clothes, and another one close by the door that fits our big luggage. The kitchen was very well equipped even though we did not use anything except the dishes and cutlery. The Internet is very fast, as described, and it averages 400mb/s downloads.
The location is very good. There are 2 subway stations nearby that can connect you to everywhere, and it is a nice walk to the World Trade Center region.
Also, the sunset from the Battery Park region and South Cove is beautiful and very near to walk to.
The staff was also very helpful with our luggage and directions.
I would definitely stay again here, and I enjoyed the Sonder experience. Will look for other spots in my upcoming trips.
Exactly what was described not really any interaction with staff needed. Amazing stay
ideal for business travellers
Our stay at Sonder Battery Park was outstanding.

Our check in was not the best however, the staff was perfect‚Ä¶ They did everything to make us feel comfortable and understood our situation‚Ä¶ I would 100% give those women and men a raise for all of the hard work‚Ä¶ I loved living here because it was a home away from home‚Ä¶ The apartment was beautiful and well kept. People that work there really made a difference. I would 100% recommend anybody to stay here.
No complaints great as always. Highly recommend!

Second time staying at the Sonder. One thigh about me when I‚Äôm traveling, I will find a Sonder to stay at. Grateful again for the stay as my husband and I celebrated our anniversary. Will definitely be back again! The location is perfect!

Amazing, perfect flat and really nice location.
I loved it so much.
Fantastic location, easy to access via metro, everything perfect.

We stayed a week and best decision we made to stay at Sonder ! Had all the amenities needed . Front desk was so helpful . Able to walk to get to a lot of things we visited . Great neighborhood ! Our first time in NYC and we would definitely book again

Sonder NYC is a very good place to stay, a bit worn out but well kept. The apartment was overall clean, silent and well equipped (even though some minor tools were missing from the kitchen, like a pan cover. The metro (multiple stations) is nearby and also the free ferry to Staten island. Probably in summer it is even better thanks to the possibility to use the rooftop pool. The price is high, as one would expect from Manhattan.

Great accommodation in Lower Manhattan. 9/11 Memorial, Staten Island Ferry, Liberty Island tours, Wall Street are only  a couple of minutes away on foot. Grocery store and restaurants are also very close, just as several subway lines. We had a nice view from our space to New Jersey. Eventhought the floor would need a proper cleaning (in the flat and outside in the corridor), the flat was tidy, the bed super comfy and the kitchen had good appliances like coffeemaker and toaster as well. The A/C is extremely loud, but it's effecient so we didn't need to use it during a long period of time. The code system is really convenient and the essentials cabinet is handy too. We had a minor problem with the WiFi but I get quick answer online. At the front desk they were super friendly when we came and left. All in all everything was perfect and we would totally recommend this Sonder.
Super spacious and clean apartment, close to many stations and easy to get around New York City, will 100% be booking again!
Nice space, great location, totally worth the price
A lot of space for New York standards. Nice apartment and clean. Would come back

Very clean. When checking in, the manager was super polite and friendly. I would have loved to be able to check in a little bit earlier but they very nicely took our luggage for storage so we could grab a bite while waiting. The sheets were a little bit dusty/stained but other than that, it was clean.
Very chic and comfortable stay at this listing. Rooftop was great for killing time. Great amenities and friendly and responsive hosts. Would stay again for sure.
Exactly as advertised, plenty of space and walkable to nearby subway station, greenways, parks, and restaurants

I really had a great time at Sonder and couldn‚Äôt recommend them more. In fact, I enjoyed it so much I extended my trip for an extra week. Even if I had to change rooms, the front desk (especially Rob) were incredibly helpful making everything super smooth. The rooms are brand new, clean and very private. The location is also amazing as it‚Äôs within walking distance to multiple subway lines. The icing on the cake is the rooftop, which has beautiful sunset views. I‚Äôd definitely come back!
Wonderful staffs and great location. Thank you Joseph, chi chi and Rob.

A great location. It's the merger of a hotel with Airbnb from before. But very good, I will surely choose to stay with any of their Sonder locations.
Thank you
The place was clean and very convenient for our stay.

There was only one bummer that the room wasn‚Äôt ready until two hours after the check-in time. Otherwise, this is an excellent location beautiful view. The rooftop patio was really nice.
We underestimated how convenient it was to have a kitchenette and the refrigerator freezer.
The unit was very modern and excellent condition. Nice to be able to crack the windows and let fresh air.
Excellent much better than hotel room

Very nice enjoyable stay! The room was bigger than expected. location was perfect. The only thing was that the game room was out of use and a swimingpool was out of season which could be reflected in the price. Other than that we can't fault it at all and definitely would stay again

Decent apartment, although in hindsight it was a lot bigger than I expected and I really didn't need that much space. But if you need a space with a kitchen that's near the financial district, not a bad choice.
Spacious, clean and great location. Great amenities. You can stay in and cook or head out on the town. I would definitely recommend staying here.

Conveniently located Downtown, many subway lines available, functional building and apartments. Apartment was well furnished with white goods, it was spacious and luminous, quite well phonically insulated given the location.  The Sonder Mobile app is easy to use and convenient.
The apartment is spacious for NYC, has great natural light, is walking distance from the water in battery park, 5 minutes from my office on Broadway.
Loved this stay would definitely stay again
Very clean accommodation with everything, we felt at home.  Very nice staff. We will definitely come back
It was beyond my expectations. The room was so big and spacious. I really enjoyed my stay and will definitely be back!

The room was perfect for us. Plenty of space to store suitcases but not overloaded. The kitchen had everything you could need.
Around the corner a metro station and also a hop on hop off stop. This makes it quick to get to the center of Manhattan.
Unfortunately right next to a large construction site. But construction noise was pointed out, so we were prepared for it.
We would definitely return.

We loved sonder! Super great area, safe and the check in staff was so lovely. Lobby and halls were no frills but that didn't bother us. I've been in places where that indicated how nice your room is going to be but not the case here room, view and cleanliness was top tier once inside! Only reason I knocked off a star was for the bed. Our bed specifically, the slats were breaking and it was on the cheaper end. Again, for us not an issue cause we are young and no health or back issues but keep in mind if you need a higher quality bed situation. But for us, no problems! We'll be staying again!!
Great roof top with pool and tires or relaxation, great location near awesome restaurants and train stations, great view of the Hudson river and love that the rooms have washer and dryer üòÑ

All in all a really good deal for what you get. We loved the location as you can go everywhere in a very short amount of time. The apartment itself looks better on the pictures than in reality; they used only cheap materials, on the 11th floor it was really loud from all the noises from the street and the tunnel, the bed felt like it was a 100 years old as you automatically roll into the middle as the mattress is already very mich worn out. Apart from those two things we loved having a pool on the roof as it was still very hot in nyc when we were there. I‚Äòd probably stay there again but wanted to mention that here for people that are sensitive to that. (:
Beautiful place with great views, vibes and wonderful helpful staff! So happy I stayed!
Great spot‚Äî I‚Äôd stay again
all as described, very good connection
Beautiful space and location.  Front desk  nickel and diming on early or late check out feels very impersonal, and not appreciated

room and amenities are of very high level and maintenance, and  it‚Äôs easy to access the subway. nice full kitchen allows for eating home food away from home. sonder app is a little buggy but allows for very easy access to room key and elevator without needing to type codes

Great stay at the Sonder! A little oasis in lower Manhattan. The layout of the studio apartment was very comfortable and the kitchen amenities meant that we didn't need to eat out for every meal. Great for a week long stay!
It felt like I was home for my entire stay at Sonder‚Äôs.  It was an amazing place and very accessible to the subway and nearby places.  Will definitely book this place again.

Very close to Battery Park. So easy to walk to Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island boat. Close to subway. I had nice view of Hudson River from my unit on 16th floor. Nice sipping coffee in the morning watching joggers in South Cove Park and the boats on the river. I actually didn‚Äôt know that this was a hotel when i booked. I thought it was apartment buildings. The rooftop was very nice. I enjoyed the night view in this beautiful green space while drinking Montauk beer. Kitchen was very nice and modern. The best area of the unit. A few fails, the spout from shower was coming out of the wall. Looked like bad repair. The corner window sills were dirty dusty where there was no access to it. Bed headboard had a stain and some hair in the area. Overall, i would give them another chance and stay here again. They just need to deep clean more regular and attention to detail.
Great place to stay we absolutely enjoyed it.
Was a good place to stay for a quick stop! Large windows to see the city. Would stay again.
Stay was great
Excellent location
Clean and exactly as described. Great location and super happy with everything about our stay.
Decent stay

Sonder is quickly becoming my go to place for large cities. It‚Äôs quiet, well-maintained, and safe. I really appreciate the comfortable bed and cleanliness of Sonder facilities. Definitely a great location to stay!
Great location!!
Exactly as advertised. Highly recommended and I look forward to staying at other properties
Excellent location. Large space, with large windows overlooking the city. All-equipped kitchen. Serving staff. I recommend it!

I had an eight day stay. On the 20th, my neighbors checked in and ruined my nights sleep. They were loud. Doors were slamming. Pot was wreaking. I wrote the host. They did nothing. The music, laughing, slamming doors, wrecked my nights sleep. I addressed it with the host and they said, ‚Äúwe can‚Äôt refund that night because no one else complained. It was just you.‚Äù Well for $500 a night, you should guarantee a good nights sleep. And they don‚Äôt. Even though they have all these rules that say you can‚Äôt party and make noise. They won‚Äôt enforce their own rules of no smoking no noise. I want a refund!

The stay was quite serene and the room exceeded my expectations. There was a minor hiccup in that my tv remotes were not in my room at all during my 3 day, 2 night stay. By the time they responded to my request it was the next day and there as still no resolution.
When I reached out to them, they told me to submit any request for comps, to reach out to AirBnB.
Great stay

This was such a lovely experience.  I was so impressed at the size of the apartment as well as the helpfulness of the staff.  Both the remote and on-site teams were extremely responsive.  The communication was great and accessing the space and all necessary info was so seamless and easy!

I do not recommend: in fact, I would say avoid at all costs. I booked (and paid) for two nights, day-of they told me my booking was lost in their system and that they had no free rooms. Just to be clear I had booked, paid, and received confirmation weeks earlier from Airbnb. After 1.5 hours of messaging and phoning, they told me the best I could get is a refund after 5-7 days. 8pm in Manhattan on a Friday night without a place to stay after a long day of travel is far from ideal. Sonder‚Äôs failure to correctly process my booking led to wasted time, canceled plans, a few hundred dollars extra of walk-in hotel rates, and plenty of stress.
Great value and a huge space for NYC
As advertised! Clean and convenient. Would stay here again.
Great location with a beautiful view. Right by the subways to get around the city. Totally enjoyed our stay. Thank you
Great. We will look for Sonder when we travel from now on.
We recommend this place for a visit in nyc. The location is convenient and quiet in a busy city. The building is safe, with 24/7 front desk, and clean!
Excellent place to stay with family and kids
We enjoyed our stay. The kitchen lacks oven/micro dishes .
The stay is really nice, Location is perfect for anybody visiting financial district. Rob from the front desk staff was really helpful! Great guy
The place was nice, but I had to ask for a bed topper because it was too hard for me.

Wonderful stay one of the most calmest streets in new York with plenty of thing a to do within walking distance. The room was very spacious way bigger than expected. Amazing skyline views Will definitely be back.
Very nice location.
It was very comfortable, clean, beautiful view. I‚Äôll recommend this place.

Placed was literally used to sleep so it served its purpose.  It was nice.   Check in/out was easy.   Only downside was no access to the roof and much of the building seemed to be under construction/renovation.
Really nice rooms with big windows, easy communication, the Sonder app was simple enough to navigate and the staff was very helpful.

We stayed four nights at Sonder.  The apartment had a small kitchen and a washer and dryer, which was nice. It was very quiet for NYC standards. The place seemed fairly rundown and dirty. Not a lot of care goes into decorating and making it look nice. However, the price is reasonable so did not expect five star quality. The location is just OK if you‚Äôre looking to see all the touristy places in New York City.. it‚Äôs very close to Wall Street and the bull but other attractions are a 30 minute subway ride. Probably a good value for some but more of a factory type vibe not luxury by any means.

I have a great time in here and I almost treated as home in NYC. The roof deck provides fresh water and great views. The staff in the front desk were friendly most of time besides my checkin. Anyway, it was worthy however I did find some app provide a better price than anb üòÖ

The room is clean and very close subway to reach any place in Manhattan. But the other guests in my neighborhood rooms are bad. they are very noisy. and I smell the weed smoke couple of days. I complained to the staff but it was not improved.
Excellent
Would definitely stay here again very nice area very nice and accommodating host and staff exceeds all expectations
This venue never disappoints.
I loved my stay here, the apartment was spacious and clean. It was everything you need for a slightly longer stay in the city.
very well located, quiet accommodation. The kitchen saves on the food budget.
Me and my wife loved the space. Finally we could find an airbnb option in New York which is clean and within budget. We will come back.

The Sonder app made staying here a breeze - the staff were super helpful and responsive.
The room itself was great, smaller than the photos but did the job! Would stay here again.

We had a perfect stay at Sonder Battery Park. Everything lived up to expectations. If you‚Äôre looking for somewhere to stay in Manhattan which is just outside of the hustle and bustle, but close enough to jump back in whenever you want, this is perfect. Would definitely stay again!
Awesome location! We have zero complaints about our stay. Room was very cozy.

it was a great place to stay.
Only the Appartment was smaller than expected.
overall i enjoyed the location
Great location and price.
The place was such and as described. Good location, friendly service and available at any time.
Good for the price
reviews.response: Thank you for your review. It's great you enjoyed your stay. If there was anything we could've done to improve, please let us know. We hope to host you again.

reviews.comments: Very clean and quiet. Easy to locate and get inside.
5 stars üåü Nice cozy, beautiful view the city,  walkable to subway station, to the park, to the ferry,  many restaurants and more.  I definitely come back and stay longer.
